intro.paragraph1: Ko te Temepara Orbital he amiorangi me te miihana toi: he whakamaumaharatanga kei waho o te waahi tuwhera ki nga tangata ora katoa e noho ana, kua noho ranei ki te whenua.
intro.paragraph2: Ma nga tikanga hangarau, ka taea e te tangata te tuku i te ingoa o tetahi ki te Temepara, he tangata kua mate, he tangata tino ora, he tangata ranei e tika ana kia maumahara.

sculpture.heading: Te Whakairo
sculpture.paragraph1: E toru nga huānga whakawhirinaki tahi o te mahi toi: he amiorangi i hangaia hei penapena piriona ingoa; he whakairo tūmatanui e whakawhiti kōrero ana me te amiorangi; me te paetukutuku e tukuna ai e nga kaiuru nga ingoa, mai i tenei wa tae noa ki te wa kua pahemo atu, ki te rangi.
sculpture.paragraph2: Hei mahi maha, ka taea te whakaaro o Orbital Temple he whakairo mo te waahi, he waahi noho. He kaupapa Artsat hoki.

antenna.heading: Te Antenna Hei Whakairo-a-iwi
antenna.paragraph1: He antenna e hono ana i a maatau ki te waahi o waho.
antenna.paragraph2: Kei te hangaia he antenna ka whakawhiti tika ki te amiorangi orbital.
antenna.paragraph3: Ma te mata whakaata koura, e whakaata ana i te rangi i runga ake, he timatanga mo te whakaihiihi papatipu (me to tatou hononga ki te mea kei runga).
antenna.paragraph4: Ahakoa kaore i whakauruhia nga whakairo ki te nuinga o nga waahi o te ao, kei te tukuna e a maatau Frames from Earth, e whakahaere ana i te amiorangi i tenei wa, i nga ingoa ki ia whakawhiti.
antenna.paragraph5: Awhina ki te kawe mai i tenei tirohanga ki to taone—te whakauru i nga whakairo antenna hei whakaohooho i nga korerorero mo te torotoro mokowhiti, toi, me to tatou waahi tiritiri i te ao. Ako atu mo te tautoko i te kaupapa .
